Dear {!Contact.Salutation} {!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName},
Parent/Teacher consultations will take place on the 19th, 20th and 21st March.
Below, for your perusal are the specific details relating to your child’s year group:
STAGE DATE TIME Foundation 19th and 20th March 2013 3.30 - 6.30pm Primary 19th and 20th March 2013 3.30 - 6.30pm Middle School 19th, 20th and 21st March 2013 3.30 - 7.30pm
In order to make an appointment kindly follow the below instructions:
· Please fill in the relevant appointment form below. (There are separate forms for Foundation, Primary and Middle School)
Foundation form Primary form Middle School form
· Once you have filled in the form please pass it back to the school reception no later than Monday, 25 February 2013.
· Once all appointment forms are in you will be notified of your appointment times through email by 15 March 2013.
Further details are in the appointment forms, however should you have any questions at all please do not hesitate to contact the school via info@britishschool.edu.my
Wishing you all a lovely weekend.
Regards, Administration Team The British International School of Kuala Lumpur World Class Education
